subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Freedom and Human Rights
Censorship
lead_paragraph: Recent actions by the Chinese government show the risk of permitting a dictatorship to play host to the Olympics in the hope that it will change its ways once the whole world is watching.
snippet: Recent actions by the Chinese government show the risk of permitting a dictatorship to play host to the Olympics in the hope that it will change its ways once the whole world is watching.
